column2: but not always. On our most recent visit
column3: our server was rushed and not very helpful. Then at the end of the night
column4: we had to wait 10 minutes because someone forgot to add our bar bill to our dinner bill
column5: which we politely pointed out when the bill was presented. Now I am not one of those people who expects things to be comped
column6: but she didn't even apologize. And then we walked right past her on our way out without her acknowledging us. I'm not usually that fussy about service as long as it's competent
column7: but at places like Uchi you expect more.
